  3. Bye Bye Badman

Luli Lee

Cloud Koh

Introduction

Bye Bye Badman is a three-member South Korean band. They debuted as a five-member band on January 7, 2011 with their self-titled EP, "Bye Bye Badman". Shortly after their second album, drummer Jung Han Sol left the band.
